note: Adventure Nepal Eco Trek Pvt. Ltd. is a well established and officially recognized destination travel Management Company based in Central Kathmandu

fields.name: Tourism
fields.value: It offers services on all aspects of travel-whether it be culture, heritage, pilgrimage tour, lodge-based treks, wildlife safari trips, rafting on the Himalayan rivers and any other adventure sports in the Himalayan regions of Nepal, Tibet ,Bhutan.
